name: Memphis (MEM) to Houston (IAH) During a Thunderstorm - United A319 - Full Flight Experience
description:
Welcome to this Full Flight Experience aboard this United A319 flight from Memphis International Airport to Houston George Bush Intercontinental Airport!

After ominous forecasts of severe storms and tornados in the Houston area, every passenger was nervous about this morning flight. After a delay in boarding, we pushed off a bit late and took to the sky! This 450-mile flight takes us from the southwest tip of Tennessee to southeastern Texas, miles from the Gulf of Mexico. Not that you can see any of it under those impressive clouds! My thanks to the crew who, despite the delay, conducted the flight beautifully!

Thanks for flying with me, and enjoy the ride!

Video Timeline
00:00 - Intro
01:15 – Boarding 
01:55 – Pushback
02:35 – Taxi
02:45 – Taxi and Captain's Announcement
03:30 – Takeoff
05:40 – Inflight Service
06:40 – Descent and Impressive Clouds!
10:25 – Gate Arrival

#flight #unitedairlines #united #airbus #memphis #mem #houston #iah #flightreview #flightreport
